title: Ranger
content:
ly. Spell Save DC: 8 + your Proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier Spell Attack Modifier: your Proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier Known Spells: 1 + your Wisdom modifier + half your Ranger level (rounded down) Spell List: Known Casters. Cannot change equiped spells freely. Can only swap equiped spells on level up. Ritual Casting: No (except Find Familiar for Beast Tamer Natural Explorer)

Unique Class Feature

Favoured Enemy: Bounty Hunter Keeper of the Veil Mage Breaker Ranger Knight San
